mapper.select: SELECT M.nickname, MB.*, MBI.filename FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN MEETINGBOARD MB ON(M.membernum = MB.meetingboardwriter) LEFT JOIN MEETINGBOARDIMAGE MBI ON(MB.meetingboardnum = MBI.meetingboardnum) ORDER BY MB.meetingboardnum DESC
mapper.insert:
SELECT MEETINGBOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM dual
INSERT INTO meetingboard(meetingboardnum, meetingboardwriter, meetingboardtitle, meetingboardcontents, meetingboardduedate, meetingboardtotalcost, meetingboardlocation, meetingboardmaxmember, meetingboardcategory, meetingboardhostdemand) VALUES (#{meetingBoardNum}, #{meetingBoardWriter}, #{meetingBoardTitle}, #{meetingBoardContents}, #{meetingBoardDueDate}, #{meetingBoardTotalCost}, #{meetingBoardLocation}, #{meetingBoardMaxMember}, #{meetingBoardCategory}, #{meetingBoardHostDemand})
INSERT INTO meetingboardimage(meetingboardnum, filename, oriname) VALUES (#{meetingBoardNum}, #{fileName}, #{oriName})
